item.description:
Thursday, August 23rd, 9:00am – 12:00pm. The Long Hike: Join the Park Interpreter on an extensive hike through Myles Standish State Forest.  This hike travels along 5 -7 miles of trails.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  We’ll meet at the parking lot on Upper College Pond Road. (#2 on the park maps. There is a link above to a map showing the location.)
Heavy rain cancels  If in doubt, call Park office: 508-866-2526
All programs are free and open to the public unless otherwise noted. All children must be accompanied by an adult. Reasonable accommodations are available upon request.
Join us at Metro's Cafe on 3A in Manomet for breakfast at 7:30 if you are interested. Their $2.95 Early Bird special is a deal.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off The Beaten Path Hike: The Long Hike
